scripts.build: npm run build:prompts && bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python:fix: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint fix skipped'

SOL_ADDRESS.description: The mint/contract address used to represent native SOL when interacting with token swap logic.

SOLANA_RPC_URL.description: The Solana RPC endpoint the application should connect to.

WALLET_SECRET_SALT.description: Salt used to derive or encrypt the Solana wallet's secret key; required if the direct secret key is not provided.

WALLET_SECRET_KEY.description: Base58-encoded Solana wallet secret (private) key; required if WALLET_SECRET_SALT is not supplied.

WALLET_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Base58-encoded Solana wallet public key corresponding to WALLET_SECRET_KEY.

SOLANA_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Alternative name accepted by runtime for the wallet's public key.

SLIPPAGE.description: Maximum acceptable slippage (likely as a percentage or basis points) for Solana swaps/transactions.

HELIUS_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the Helius Solana infrastructure services.

BIRDEYE_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing Birdeye market data services.

SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The Solana wallet private key in base58 or base64 format, used to create a Keypair when private key access is required.

WALLET_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Alternative variable name for the Solana wallet private key in base58 or base64.
